sense.def:
Speech
je govorjeni jezik, govorno dejanje ali sposobnost govorjenja.

seg.quote: In ordinary speech we often shorten the word ‘cannot’ to ‘can't’.
She was so shocked that she lost her powers of speech.

sense.def:
A speech
je uradno govorjenje pred občinstvom.

seg.quote: Mr Macmillan made a speech on the importance of education.

sense.def:
A speech
je tudi zaključena enota besedila, ki ga v gledališki igri govori neka oseba.

seg.quote: She recited a speech from ‘As You Like It’.

sense.def:
The speech of a particular place
je jezik ali narečje, ki ga govorijo v določenem kraju.

seg.quote: He can mimic Cockney speech quite well.
